title.rendered: Eat the Rich: The GameStop Saga

content.rendered:
Directed by Theo Love

Cast Daniel Wilson( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Diana Wilson( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Peter Sasaki( Self – Co-Founder, Odeon Capital Advisors3 episodes, 2022 ). Bob Sloan( Self – Founder, S3 Partners3 episodes, 2022 ). Mikey Guggenheim( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor, Rapper3 episodes, 2022 ). Vicki Bogan( Self – Professor of Economics, Cornell University3 episodes, 2022 ). Rachael Sassara( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor, Rapper3 episodes, 2022 ). Erik Hess( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor, Rapper3 episodes, 2022 ). Gunjan Banerji( Self – Markets Reporter, The Wall Street Journal3 episodes, 2022 ). Matt Kohrs( Self – Retail Investor, YouTube Finfluencer3 episodes, 2022 ). Alvan Chow( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Angelica Tecson( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Joe Fonicello( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Taylor Lorenz( Self – Internet Culture Reporter, The Washington Post3 episodes, 2022 ). Andrew Left( Self – Founder, Citron Research3 episodes, 2022 ). Abbe Minor( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Gina-Gail Fletcher( Self – Professor of Financial Regulation, Duke University School of Law3 episodes, 2022 ). Jim Cramer( Self – Host of Mad Money, CNBC3 episodes, 2022 ). Eddie Koo( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor3 episodes, 2022 ). Jason Mudrick( Self – Founder, Mudrick Capital Management, Hedge Fund Manager3 episodes, 2022 ). Austin Tobitt( Self – Subreddit Moderator3 episodes, 2022 ). Ray Buffer( Republican Politician3 episodes, 2022 ). Bryan Mittelstadt( Ivan the Internet Investigator (reenactment)3 episodes, 2022 ). Julia-Ambra Verlaine( Self – Markets Reporter, The Wall Street Journal2 episodes, 2022 ). Andrew Metrick( Self – Professor of Finance and Management, Yale School of Management2 episodes, 2022 ). Chris Ream( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor2 episodes, 2022 ). Alexis Goldstein( Self – Director of Financial Policy, Open Markets Institute2 episodes, 2022 ). Cindy Axne( Self – US Representative for lowa (D)1 episode, 2022 ). Pat Toomey( Self – US Senator for Pennsylvania (R)1 episode, 2022 ). Dennis Kelleher( Self – Better Markets Co-Founder & CEO1 episode, 2022 ). Desmund Delaney( Self – Retail Investor, Redditor1 episode, 2022 ). Robert Shiller( Self – Nobel Prize-Winning Economist1 episode, 2022 ). Scott Galloway( Self – Podcast Host and Professor, NYU1 episode, 2022)

Language English

Producers Jon Bardin. Dan Cogan. Julie Gaither. Liz Garbus. Leah-Lani Griffin. Amy Hobby. Jack Youngelson. Anthony Galloway. Daniel Rosen. Jen Sall. Joseph Malloch

Production Christine Brandt.

Official site Netflix

Season 1

Episodes 3
